actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Friday, November 8, 2024,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Friday, November 8, 2024, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

S. 2581 (Sen. Crapo):
        A bill to extend the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000.

        -- Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.


 S.Res. 892 (Sen. Coons):
        A resolution designating the week beginning on October 13, 2024, as "National Wildlife Refuge Week".

        -- Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

PN1749:
        Embry J. Kidd, of Florida, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Eleventh Circuit

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.


 PN1960:
        April M. Perry, of Illinois, to be United States District Judge for the Northern District of Illinois

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 44. Record Vote Number: 256
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Schumer, at  6:56 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 12 noon tomorrow.
